languages.text: "Сервиторы — пасынки {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Омниссии{/g}. У меня на родине говорят именно так. Может, наследство следует передать родителю? Точнее, его представителю". {n}Джай умудряется сделать взгляд, посланный Паскалю, одновременно заговорщицким и умоляющим.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Сервиторы — пасынки Омниссии. У меня на родине говорят именно так. Может, наследство следует передать родителю? Точнее, его представителю". {n}Джай умудряется сделать взгляд, посланный Паскалю, одновременно заговорщицким и умоляющим.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Servitors are the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}'s stepchildren. That's what they say in my homeland. Shouldn't the inheritance go to the parent? Their representative, to be specific." {n}Jae somehow manages to cast Pasqal a glance that is both conspiratorial and pleading.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Сервиторы — пасынки {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Омниссии{/g}. У меня на родине говорят именно так. Может, наследство следует передать родителю? Точнее, его представителю". {n}Джай умудряется сделать взгляд, посланный Паскалю, одновременно заговорщицким и умоляющим.{/n}

Their representative, to be specific." {n}Jae somehow manages to cast Pasqal a glance that is both conspiratorial and pleading.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “机仆是{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}欧姆尼塞亚{/g}的子女。至少在我的故乡，人们就是这么说的。既然如此，那这笔遗产不应该归机仆的父母所有吗？具体说来，应该归父母的代表所有。”{n}不知为何，婕伊朝帕斯卡投去了一个既恳切、又狡猾的眼神。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Servitors are the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}'s stepchildren. That's what they say in my homeland. Shouldn't the inheritance go to the parent? Their representative, to be specific." {n}Jae somehow manages to cast Pasqal a glance that is both conspiratorial and pleading.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “奴工是{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}欧姆尼塞亚{/g}的子女。至少在我的故乡，人们就是这么说的。既然如此，那这笔遗产不应该归奴工的父母所有吗？具体说来，应该归父母的代表所有。”{n}不知为何，婕伊朝帕斯卡投去了一个既恳切、又狡猾的眼神。{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «Los servidores son los hijastros del {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}, según se dice en mi tierra. ¿No debería pasar la herencia a su padre? O a su representante, concretamente». {n}Jae consigue de algún modo lanzar a Pasqal una mirada conspiratoria y de súplica al mismo tiempo.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Servitors are the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}'s stepchildren. That's what they say in my homeland. Shouldn't the inheritance go to the parent? Their representative, to be specific." {n}Jae somehow manages to cast Pasqal a glance that is both conspiratorial and pleading.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Los servidores son los hijastros del {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}, según se dice en mi tierra. ¿No debería pasar la herencia a su padre? O a su representante, concretamente». {n}Jae consigue de algún modo lanzar a Pasqal una mirada conspiratoria y de súplica al mismo tiempo.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「サーヴィターは{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}万機神{/g}の継子。アタシの故郷ではそのように呼んでいるわ。相続は親に行くべきじゃない？厳密に言えば、彼の代理人に」{n}ジェイはパスカルに向けて、陰謀と懇願を込めた視線をそれとなく投げかけた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Servitors are the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}'s stepchildren. That's what they say in my homeland. Shouldn't the inheritance go to the parent? Their representative, to be specific." {n}Jae somehow manages to cast Pasqal a glance that is both conspiratorial and pleading.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「サーヴィターは{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}万機神{/g}の継子。アタシの故郷ではそのように呼んでいるわ。相続は親に行くべきじゃない？厳密に言えば、彼の代理人に」{n}ジェイはパスカルに向けて、陰謀と懇願を込めた視線をそれとなく投げかけた。{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Servitoren sind die Stiefkinder des {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}. So sagt man in meinem Heimatland. Sollte das Erbe dann nicht an die Eltern gehen? Oder ihren Vertreter, um genau zu sein." {n}Jae wirft Pasqal einen Blick zu, der gleichzeitig verschwörerisch und flehend wirkt.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Servitors are the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}'s stepchildren. That's what they say in my homeland. Shouldn't the inheritance go to the parent? Their representative, to be specific." {n}Jae somehow manages to cast Pasqal a glance that is both conspiratorial and pleading.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Servitoren sind die Stiefkinder des {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}. So sagt man in meinem Heimatland. Sollte das Erbe dann nicht an die Eltern gehen? Oder ihren Vertreter, um genau zu sein." {n}Jae wirft Pasqal einen Blick zu, der gleichzeitig verschwörerisch und flehend wirkt.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Là d'où je viens, on dit que les servitors sont les beaux-enfants de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnimessie{/g}. L'héritage ne devrait-il pas revenir à leur parent ? Ou, pour être plus précise, à un de ses représentants. » {n}Jae lance un regard moitié conspirateur, moitié implorant à Pasqal.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Servitors are the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}'s stepchildren. That's what they say in my homeland. Shouldn't the inheritance go to the parent? Their representative, to be specific." {n}Jae somehow manages to cast Pasqal a glance that is both conspiratorial and pleading.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Là d'où je viens, on dit que les servitors sont les beaux-enfants de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnimessie{/g}. L'héritage ne devrait-il pas revenir à leur parent ? Ou, pour être plus précise, à un de ses représentants. » {n}Jae lance un regard moitié conspirateur, moitié implorant à Pasqal.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Hizmetörler, {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Hermesih'in{/g} üvey çocuklarıdır. Memleketimde böyle söylerler. O zaman mirasın ebeveyne gitmesi gerekmez mi? Daha doğrusu onların temsilcisine." {n}Jae, Pasqal'a bir şekilde hem komplocu hem de yalvarmaklı bir bakış atmayı başarıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Servitors are the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}'s stepchildren. That's what they say in my homeland. Shouldn't the inheritance go to the parent? Their representative, to be specific." {n}Jae somehow manages to cast Pasqal a glance that is both conspiratorial and pleading.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Servitörler, {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Hermesih{/g}'in üvey çocuklarıdır. Benim memleketimde böyle söylerler. O zaman mirasın ebeveyne gitmesi gerekmez mi? Yani onların temsilcisine." {n}Jae, Pasqal'a bir şekilde hem suçlayıcı hem de yalvaran bir bakış atmayı başarıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
